verbose_text: We recently reported that real-time polymerase chain reaction (PCR) is more sensitive than IF for the diagnosis of PCP when used on lower [induced sputum (IS) or non bronchoscopic broncho-alveolar lavage (BAL)] or upper respiratory tract [nasopharyngeal aspirate (NPA)] specimens.
